amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds in the bill by 11.1208 percent except for National Nuclear Security Administration, Environmental and Defense Activities, and Defense Nuclear Facilities Safety Board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the bill by 11.1208 percent except for National Nuclear Security Administration, Environmental and Defense Activities, and Defense Nuclear Facilities Safety Board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 278 (Roll no. 205).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
